file_content.text:
[A posting on a Voss bounty board requests outside assistance.]
Notice: Revered Mystic Salus-Mok has had a vision. Gormak logging machines threaten Voss. No Voss may intervene. Outsiders must destroy the machines. Reward offered.
[The Gormak logging camps can be found to the south.]

Alert: For the death of the Healer Mystic Raeda-Ke, a bounty has been issued for the Gormak chieftain Althu.
A known vassal of Raklann and already responsible for numerous crimes, Althu is now under death sentence as an enemy of the Empire.
A generous bounty will be paid for Althu's swift destruction. Standard pay is offered for any additional hazards.
Althu has fled to a defensive position near the Err-Ka dam within the Pelath-Ri Marches. Coordinates are provided.
